This happens because the test depends on something in the  
"org.eclipse.ui.examples.navigator".  If you create a normal launch  
configuration and have "org.eclipse.ui.examples.navigator" checked out, you  
won't notice (as all plug-ins in the workspace are included by default). 
 
I believe you need something like the following in the tests (though you may 
wish to make the example view and the test view with different ids): 
 
   <extension 
         point="org.eclipse.ui.views"> 
      <view 
            class="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.CommonNavigator" 
            id="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resourceContent" 
            name="%Common_Navigator_Example"/> 
   </extension>

Created an attachment (id=28994)
Added experimental Navigator view

Created an attachment (id=28995)
Removed example navigator view (in favor of experimental navigator view)

The patch has been released. This problem has been resolved by removing the
example view and adding an Experimental Resource Navigator view.
